wéishēng to make a living

shòurè heated; sunstroke

traditional: 往來
wǎnglái dealings; contacts; to go back and forth

luòyáng Luoyang

traditional: 間隔
jiàngé compartment; gap; interval

traditional: 主體
zhǔtǐ main part; subject; agent

traditional: 樣品
yàngpǐn sample; specimen

traditional: 劇烈
jùliè violent; acute; severe; fierce
